name: Five Nights at Jack's (FNAJ)
description:
STORY :

We're in 1995, you're an employee  of Jack's Restaurant. Your work is to make sure that nobody enter in the restaurant at night. But it appears that the restaurant is cursed because of a failed ritual.

The real danger don't come from the outside but from the inside !

You'll meet 4 principal animatronics :
- Jack the cat
- Gully the seagull
- Froggy the frog
- Hazel the beaver

Each one have a different strategy, try to anticipate their movements.

INSTRUCTIONS :

Use the flashlight : Spacebar

Close the door : W / Click on the red button

Close the vent doors : Click on the white squares

CREDITS : 

Programing / Musics / Graphics : Akip (me)

Beta-testing : DrDuck , Joker, Table and  Zijo
